name: Super Car F. Mod for MCPE
name_original: Super Car F. Mod for MCPE
description:
DISCLAIMER: This is an unofficial application for Minecraft Pocket Edition. This application is not associated in any way with Mojang AB. Minecraft Name, Minecraft Mark and Minecraft Assets are all property of Mojang AB or their respectful owner. All rights reserved. In accordance with http://account.mojang.com/documents/brand_guidelines

Thanks to the fashion of theSuper Car F.Mod, you will have the opportunity to get one of the most expensive cars. Super Car F. Mod much higher than any other sled creature. In addition, the car has incredible detail, both outside and inside. The car has two seats, but only one player can sit in it.
Android: long press on the car press Drive. In order to start driving, you need to take the key (carrots on a stick) and look in the direction you want to go to.
